item.title: Day 274 The Bible KNEECAP Preview | The Bible Recap
item.description: Podcast Description This bonus episode is a sample of our daily prayer podcast, called “The Bible Kneecap”. This podcast is available exclusively for members of our RECAPtains community.If you like what you hear, join the RECAPtains at the $10/month tier (The Bible Kneecap tier) or higher to pray with us as we read through the Bible. Transcript

item.title: The Bible Kneecap Free Preview | The Bible Recap
item.description: Podcast Description Father, We praise You for the way You care for Your kids even when they’ve wandered off. You identify so closely with us that anytime we’re mistreated, You take it personally. Thank You for working justice on those who have opposed and oppressed Your people. Have mercy on me, a sinner. We repent of our sins and turn to You and we ask You to make our hearts clean.

item.title: The Bible Kneecap Free Preview | The Bible Recap
item.description: Podcast Description YHWH Shalom, We praise You for being our Peace in the midst of chaos. Like Gideon, our lives feel overwhelming sometimes, but You enter in and draw near and bring us what we wouldn’t have access to without You. We praise You for Your perfect timing and miraculous provision. Thank You for the leaders who lead us in your paths of righteousness. Thank You for the prophets who call out our sin and speak truth to us.
